name: Image Carousel For Divi
author: WP Tools

sections.description:
Plugin depreciated. No further development planned for this plugin. Only maintenance and compatibility updates will be issued

Use our Ultimate Carousel For Divi plugin. It has better functionality.

The Image Carousel For Divi plugin provides a divi module for cycling through images.

Show logos of clients, products, projects using the sliding carousel.

This plugin requires Divi Theme (Affiliate link) be installed and activated.

Image Carousel divi module provides following functionality.

  • Full visual builder support
  • Unlimited images
  • Sort by drag and drop
  • Set images per slide for desktop view.

Premium version features

Premium version link

To learn about premium features, setup & styling visit https://wptools.app/how-to/setup-and-style-divi-image-carousel/
sections.installation:
1. Goto your WordPress Admin > Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for image-carousel-for-divi.
  3. Install and activate plugin (with the author as wpt00ls)
sections.faq:
Can you tell me more about the premium features?

Details on our premium features are available at https://wptools.app/how-to/setup-and-style-divi-image-carousel/

Are there are any dependencies for this plugin

No, there are no dependencies for this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.8.0

  • Fixed incompatibility with WordPress 6.5 which caused a critical error.

1.7.1

  • Fixed divi builder module error on the divi builder page due to PHP 8.1 compatibility.

1.7.0

  • php8.1 compatible
  • freemius upgrade

1.6.1

  • Freemius Upgrade

1.6.0

  • Added URL and URL OPEN fields to the image item. This enables linking of carousel image with a URL.
  • Updated Freemius

=1.5.0=
* Updated freemius SDK to v2.4.3
* WP version 5.9.2

=1.4.0=
* Tested with WordPress 5.4.2
* Added compatibility for Divi 4.5.1+

[//]: # fs_premium_only_begin
=1.3.1=
* Default values for images per slide in tablet and mobile view updated.
[//]: # fs_premium_only_end

1.3.0

  • [Bug fix] – Number of images moving per slide initial value was wrong. Fixed it.
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_begin
  • Added Vertical Alignment field for images. Defaults to center
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_end

1.2.0

  • Updated freemius SDK to 2.3.2
  • Moved settings from WP Tools to Divi. Removed parent WP Tools settings page.
  • Fixed advanced/toggle options in divi module for wp.org version.
  • Tested for WordPress 5.4
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_begin
  • Removed Premium label from premium divi module
    [//]: # fs_premium_only_end

1.0.1

  • Added Animation Speed divi module field to control the speed of the image slide/fade.
  • Upgraded freemius version to 2.3.1

1.0.0

  • Created free version for wordpress.org
  • Created premium version for freemius.com

short_description: A divi image carousel module to create a slide-show with images.

screenshots.caption: This screenshot shows the image carousel divi module on the frontend builder. Add multiple images. Reorder then with drag and drop. Setup the initial slide to start on and number of images per slide (only on desktop view.)
